briefTitle: COmparing arNi and Ace For Improving Erectile Dysfunction in mEN With reduCed Ejection Fraction Heart Failure
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Active-controlled Study to Assess the Effect of Sacubitril/Valsartan Compared With Enalapril to Improve Erectile Function in Patients With Heart Failure With Reduced Ejection Fraction and Erectile Dysfunction
summary: The purpose of this study was to determine the effect of sacubitril/valsartan (LCZ696) vs. Enalapril on improvement in erectile function and ability in male patients with chronic heart failure with reduced ejection fraction and erectile dysfunction.

primaryOutcome.measure: Erectile Function Score Using Index of Erectile Function (IIEF-15)
